name: Destiny Board (Skill)
text: Can be used if "Dark Necrofear" is in your Graveyard, and your Life Points are at 2000 or below. At the end of your fifth turn after activating this Skill, you win the Duel. This Skill is negated if "Dark Necrofear" leaves your Graveyard. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
